snippet: The anniversary of the 2011 nuclear disaster in Japan brought back memories of growing up in Colorado and being clueless about what the nearby plutonium plant did.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Kristen Iversen recalls growing up in Colorado near Rocky Flats, which produced plutonium for nuclear weapons; recollections are prompted by the anniversary of the nuclear disaster in Japan, and a report released that details the extent to which the Tokyo Electric Power Company and Japanese officials supplied the public with misinformation.
lead_paragraph: The anniversary of the 2011 nuclear disaster in Japan brought back memories of growing up in Colorado and being clueless about what the nearby plutonium plant did.

headline.seo: Fallout at a Former Nuclear Weapon Plant
